title: Audio / Electronics Technician - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Audio / Electronics Technician Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: The Athletics Audio/Electronic Repair Technician will provide assistance to the Electronics Engineer in testing, repair and maintenance of our University Athletic Dept electronic equipment.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
